import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const DeleteEventModal = (props) => { console.log(props); console.log(props.eventForDate(props.clicked)) const { onDelete, eventText, eventReminder, eventLocation, eventTime, onClose, onSave } = props const [editModeOn, setEditModeOn] = useState(false) const [timeSlotOne, setTimeSlotOne] = useState(''); const [amPmOne, setAmPmOne] = useState(''); const [timeSlotTwo, setTimeSlotTwo] = useState(''); const [amPmTwo, setAmPmTwo] = useState('') const onEdit = () => { onSave(eventText,eventReminder,eventLocation, timeSlotOne, amPmOne, timeSlotTwo, amPmTwo); onDelete() } useEffect(() => { console.log(eventText,eventReminder,eventLocation, timeSlotOne, amPmOne, timeSlotTwo, amPmTwo) }, [eventText,eventReminder,eventLocation, timeSlotOne, amPmOne, timeSlotTwo, amPmTwo]) return ( <>

) } export default DeleteEventModal
